attributes.action: launch an enquiry into any negative influence of political correctness upon the police.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Has political correctness had a negative impact upon the ability of the police to carry out their duties.  There are reports that individuals below the standard required are being accepted whilst people who easily pass are being rejected because of the quotas being implemented. Racism should not exist in the police but the police should not recruit individuals who are not up to the required standards.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
